title: RACIST / FASCHA DQ FOLDER
description: Ask the racist lorryman if he knows how to turn back time. Spoiler alert - he doesn't.

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I'm trying to turn back time. Can..."
dialogueTree.text: "I'm trying to turn back time. Can you help me, br√∂ther?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This again, really?" The lieutenan..."
links.text: "This again, really?" The lieutenant looks frustrated.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Let's get one thing straight: You..."
links.text: "Let's get one thing straight: You can't tell a man to 'fuck off' and then say he's your brother. It doesn't work like that..."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "The lorryman ignores the lieutenant..."
links.text: The lorryman ignores the lieutenant. "My friend, I don't know what you're after, but I have to tell you there's no turning back time..."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Mhmhm, I see..." The lorryman take..."
links.text: "Mhmhm, I see..." The lorryman takes a long drag from his cigarette.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've got to be kidding me..." Th..."
links.text: "You've got to be kidding me..." The lieutenant rubs his forehead as if hit by a sudden migraine. "What is this, detective?"

links.title: You: ""Bear with me, Kim, this could be v..."
links.text: "Bear with me, Kim, this could be very important."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I promise you, it isn't." He lets..."
links.text: "I promise you, it isn't." He lets out a sigh. "Just please make it quick, I'll organise my notes in the meantime."

links.title: You: ""Relax, Kim, it'll only be a minute.""
links.text: "Relax, Kim, it'll only be a minute."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, it won't be." He lets out a si..."
links.text: "No, it won't be." He lets out a sigh. "And even if it were, it would be a waste of a minute. Just please make it quick, I'll organise my notes in the meantime."

links.title: You: ""My gut tells me he's exactly the k..."
links.text: "My gut tells me he's exactly the kind of guy I'm looking for." (Wink at the lorryman.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I promise, he isn't." He lets out..."
links.text: "I promise, he isn't." He lets out a sigh. "Just please make it quick, I'll organise my notes in the meantime."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Let's get one thing straight: You..."
links.text: "Let's get one thing straight: You can't tell a man to 'fuck off' and then say he's your brother. It doesn't work like that..."

links.title: Suggestion: "Listen, despite his hostile exterio..."
links.text: Listen, despite his hostile exterior, this one's got a soft underbelly. He's desperate for affirmation...

links.title: Suggestion: "Massage his ego, feed him a few gra..."
links.text: Massage his ego, feed him a few grapes, make him *like* you.

links.title: Half Light: "DON'T FORGET TO TICKLE THE BEANBAG!"
links.text: DON'T FORGET TO TICKLE THE BEANBAG!

links.title: Logic: "Okay, but don't *literally* say tha..."
links.text: Okay, but don't *literally* say that.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Now what makes you think I know ho..."
links.text: "Now what makes you think I know how to 'turn back time'?"

links.title: You: ""Listen, I just need your bean bag..."
links.text: "Listen, I just need your bean bag for a moment..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's eyebrow is conspic..."
links.text: The lieutenant's eyebrow is conspicuously arched.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""My... what? Ah!" He jumps back wit..."
links.text: "My... what? Ah!" He jumps back with a look of disgust. "Fucking puffs everywhere..."

links.title: You: ""You seem like a man who knows what..."
links.text: "You seem like a man who knows what's *really* going on."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "A grunt of acknowledgement. "I *do*..."
links.text: A grunt of acknowledgement. "I *do* try to keep up with my own sources. Independent stuff. You can't believe half of what you hear out there..."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "He takes a drag of his cigarette. "..."
links.text: He takes a drag of his cigarette. "I've done the reading, I know what the *real* experts say. Our greatest days are behind us, and we're not going back."

links.title: You: ""My gut tells me you're just the gu..."
links.text: "My gut tells me you're just the guy I'm looking for."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Your 'gut', huh?" He stares at you..."
links.text: "Your 'gut', huh?" He stares at you intently.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "He's confused now, off his balance...."
links.text: He's confused now, off his balance...

links.title: Drama: "He's looking for sssigns of deceit...."
links.text: He's looking for sssigns of deceit...

links.title: Half Light: "His hackles are up, scanning for th..."
links.text: His hackles are up, scanning for threats...

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Are you mocking me right now, runt?""
links.text: "Are you mocking me right now, runt?"

links.title: You: ""What? No way.""
links.text: "What? No way."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "He relaxes, slightly. "People think..."
links.text: He relaxes, slightly. "People think it's so easy, being a lorry driver. Well it *isn't*, okay?"

links.title: Endurance: "The rumbling in your stomach says t..."
links.text: The rumbling in your stomach says there's something not quite right with this one...

links.title: You: "(Shrug.) "Maybe a little.""
links.text: (Shrug.) "Maybe a little."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""You think it's *easy* to stay in s..."
links.text: "You think it's *easy* to stay in shape driving a lorry six days a week?!" His voice is unnaturally shrill. "You guys got it easy, on your feet all day long, burning calories and what not..."

links.title: Endurance: "The rumbling in your stomach says t..."
links.text: The rumbling in your stomach says there's something not quite right with this one...

links.title: Composure: "Alert! We detect *major* body-image..."
links.text: Alert! We detect *major* body-image disturbance.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""What's a guy like *me* supposed to..."
links.text: "What's a guy like *me* supposed to do, huh? Fucking butt-clenches while I'm driving, like some kind of anal acrobat in the homo circus?!"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Anal acrobats actually train using..."
links.text: Anal acrobats actually train using a series of stomach breathing exercises, not butt-clenches. Not many people know that.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "But you do. Go figure."
links.text: But you do. Go figure.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Also, there is no such thing as a '..."
links.text: Also, there is no such thing as a 'homo circus'.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, yeah I am.""
links.text: "Yeah, yeah I am."

links.title: You: ""You're a big time racist, right? I..."
links.text: "You're a big time racist, right? I thought you were into that kinda stuff."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""What do you mean by 'big time' rac..."
links.text: "What do you mean by 'big time' racist, exactly?" He stares at you intently.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "He shakes his head. "My friend, I d..."
links.text: He shakes his head. "My friend, I don't know what you're after, but I have to tell you there's no turning back time..."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I've seen the demographic reports,..."
links.text: "I've seen the demographic reports, I know what our experts say. Our greatest days as a people are behind us, and we're not going back."

links.title: You: ""What about the ancient fascist mag..."
links.text: "What about the ancient fascist magic?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "He shakes his head sadly. "Trust me..."
links.text: He shakes his head sadly. "Trust me, brother, I've done the research. Fascist magic just ain't true."

links.title: You: ""So Measurehead was right... Haplog..."
links.text: "So Measurehead was right... Haplogroup B4's time is over."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""No, that's bullshit. We can't turn..."
links.text: "No, that's bullshit. We can't turn back time, but that doesn't mean we can just surrender to the savages..."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""It's about preserving our heritage..."
links.text: "It's about preserving our heritage, our *birthright*."

links.title: You: ""What am I supposed to do then?" (P..."
links.text: "What am I supposed to do then?" (Proceed.)

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""That's the question, isn't it?" He..."
links.text: "That's the question, isn't it?" He takes a drag. "People think you and me got it so easy. But the reality is it's fucking *hard* to be a regular guy these days..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Is he serious right now?"
links.text: Is he serious right now?

links.title: Endurance: "The rumbling in your stomach says t..."
links.text: The rumbling in your stomach says there's something not quite right with this one...

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""You know, I get funny looks from p..."
links.text: "You know, I get funny looks from people all the time. I *know* they're looking at my gut. I can *see* that. Big fucking deal, a guy put on a little weight, who cares?"

links.title: Composure: "Alert! We detect *major* body-image..."
links.text: Alert! We detect *major* body-image disturbance.

links.title: Half Light: "He's really got himself worked up n..."
links.text: He's really got himself worked up now. Dangerous stores of pent-up emotion there.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "He grinds a cigarette butt into the..."
links.text: He grinds a cigarette butt into the pavement and quickly lights another.

links.title: You: "What's *really* going on with this..."
links.text: What's *really* going on with this guy?

links.title: Logic: "In reality, there is no 'culture wa..."
links.text: In reality, there is no 'culture war', but there *is* a struggle for mating privileges -- always has been -- and this man is outgunned and completely ill-equipped for this 'conflict'.

links.title: You: "I feel outgunned and ill-equipped t..."
links.text: I feel outgunned and ill-equipped too...

links.title: Logic: "This really isn't about *you* right..."
links.text: This really isn't about *you* right now.

links.title: You: "Why is he outgunned?"
links.text: Why is he outgunned?

links.title: Logic: "It starts with the genetic lottery...."
links.text: It starts with the genetic lottery. A few are born handsome, imposing giants, while most -- like this guy -- are just average. The less fortunate have an underdeveloped limb, a sense missing, or worse.

links.title: Endurance: "Only the most average survive Extin..."
links.text: Only the most average survive Extinction-Level Events. That's a known fact.

links.title: Logic: "But there's a lot one can do with '..."
links.text: But there's a lot one can do with 'average', and this guy hasn't. Now, past his prime, it's unlikely he ever will. While others dominate the 'killing fields', he will sink to the bottom of the mating pool.

links.title: You: "How is he ill-equipped?"
links.text: How is he ill-equipped?

links.title: Logic: "It's his defeatist, self-pitying me..."
links.text: It's his defeatist, self-pitying mentality. A sense that the world *owes* him a mate, because he perceives himself to be a 'good guy'.

links.title: Suggestion: "The ladies don't like that, it isn'..."
links.text: The ladies don't like that, it isn't *sexy*.

links.title: Logic: "He isn't interested in evolving, im..."
links.text: He isn't interested in evolving, improving, or working for it. He thinks by just *being* he is entitled to love and respect.

links.title: Logic: "But the truth is there's a hundred..."
links.text: But the truth is there's a hundred million men like him competing for every single female out there, and his attitude virtually guarantees he'll never come out on top.

links.title: You: "That's why he is... like he is? (Co..."
links.text: That's why he is... like he is? (Continue.)

links.title: Logic: "It's a vicious cycle he is unlikely..."
links.text: It's a vicious cycle he is unlikely to ever break. The lack of female affection makes him bitter. His bitterness in turn reduces his chances of gaining that affection...

links.title: You: "Wait, could this happen to me?"
links.text: Wait, could this happen to me?

links.title: Logic: "Easily."
links.text: Easily.

links.title: Inland Empire: "How do you know it already hasn't?"
links.text: How do you know it already hasn't?

links.title: You: "Well, maybe he shouldn't be such a..."
links.text: Well, maybe he shouldn't be such a bigot then?

links.title: Logic: "And maybe he wouldn't be such a big..."
links.text: And maybe he wouldn't be such a bigot if he had found love sooner? But so it goes.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""You still with us, runt? Or are yo..."
links.text: "You still with us, runt? Or are you just gonna stand around like a glue-sniffer?"

links.title: You: "Poor guy..."
links.text: Poor guy...

links.title: Logic: "That's how he played the hand he wa..."
links.text: That's how he played the hand he was dealt. At least he's blissfully ignorant to the cyclical nature of his situation.

links.title: You: "No, I was thinking about myself."
links.text: No, I was thinking about myself.

links.title: Logic: "We know."
links.text: We know.

links.title: You: "So what should I say to him?"
links.text: So what should I say to him?

links.title: Logic: "Just be nice. Or tear him to pieces..."
links.text: Just be nice. Or tear him to pieces. Or ignore him. You're not going to *change* him.

links.title: Logic: "Did you not hear what he said? Ther..."
links.text: Did you not hear what he said? There's a culture war raging out there, and *this* unlikely hero might be our last, best chance. That's all this is about.

links.title: You: "(Deep breath.) I must steel myself."
links.text: (Deep breath.) I must steel myself.

links.title: Logic: "That's right. Guns and swords are t..."
links.text: That's right. Guns and swords are the only things that will protect you from youth culture and demographic change.

links.title: You: "I'm satisfied with this conclusion."
links.text: I'm satisfied with this conclusion.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""You still with us, runt? Or are yo..."
links.text: "You still with us, runt? Or are you just gonna stand around like a glue-sniffer?"

links.title: You: "No, I think there was something els..."
links.text: No, I think there was something else...

links.title: You: "(Look around.) I don't *see* a cult..."
links.text: (Look around.) I don't *see* a culture war, though.

links.title: Logic: "That's how badly you're losing, you..."
links.text: That's how badly you're losing, you don't even realise it's happening! Thank god this hero is here, fighting for all of us.

links.title: You: ""By the way, anal acrobats actually..."
links.text: "By the way, anal acrobats actually use stomach breathing to relax the external sphincter..."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""What? I don't wanna hear about you..."
links.text: "What? I don't wanna hear about your bum-play! I'm trying to tell you what life is like out there for the working man and you're going on about sphincters."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Hey, you're just trying to share so..."
links.text: Hey, you're just trying to share some useful information here!

links.title: You: ""You know, if you weren't so bitter..."
links.text: "You know, if you weren't so bitter, you might have more luck with the ladies."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Oh, *that* old song." He spits."
links.text: "Oh, *that* old song." He spits.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "You're not the first person to poin..."
links.text: You're not the first person to point this out to him, with similar results.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""People today, they only look at wh..."
links.text: "People today, they only look at what's on the surface. These women, they all want a guy who looks like Kipty the Kipt over there." He nods to the gate.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Again, is he actually serious right..."
links.text: Again, is he actually serious right now?

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""They don't *care* if you're a good..."
links.text: "They don't *care* if you're a good guy. They're superficial creatures. That's just the truth." He takes a long drag.

links.title: You: ""I know exactly what you mean. You..."
links.text: "I know exactly what you mean. You gotta get as far away from that shit as possible."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Yeah," he hisses, "sounds about ri..."
links.text: "Yeah," he hisses, "sounds about right."

links.title: You: ""You're just weak. That's why you'v..."
links.text: "You're just weak. That's why you've sunk to the bottom of the mating pool."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Hey, fuck you, alright? *We're* su..."
links.text: "Hey, fuck you, alright? *We're* supposed to be the ones on top, not... you know..." He nods toward the gates.

links.title: You: ""Just hang in there, lorryman." (Pa..."
links.text: "Just hang in there, lorryman." (Pat him on the shoulder.) "It'll get better."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I'll believe it when I see it." He..."
links.text: "I'll believe it when I see it." He shrugs off your hand. "Whatever, I don't care. It's all the same to me..."

links.title: Empathy: "It's not. It's really not."
links.text: It's not. It's really not.

links.title: You: "(Shake your head.) "Women, who need..."
links.text: (Shake your head.) "Women, who needs 'em?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Our race does, man. That's the who..."
links.text: "Our race does, man. That's the whole idea. If we don't get 'em, the kipts and the Kojkos will. It's just biological reality."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yeah, who in their right mind would..."
links.text: Yeah, who in their right mind would judge a book by its cover, lorryman?

links.title: You: ""So... can you help me turn back ti..."
links.text: "So... can you help me turn back time, or not?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Time, yeah... Listen, man, do you..."
links.text: "Time, yeah... Listen, man, do you even understand how *hard* we've got it? How completely *stacked* the whole rotten deck is against people like you and me?" He takes a furious drag of his cigarette.

links.title: Empathy: "He's not listening at all, just cir..."
links.text: He's not listening at all, just circling the drain...

links.title: You: ""Time, Lorryman -- CAN YOU REVERSE..."
links.text: "Time, Lorryman -- CAN YOU REVERSE IT?!"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "The lorryman looks at you like he c..."
links.text: The lorryman looks at you like he can't decide whether he wants to smash something or break down in tears. The silence is heavy and uncomfortable.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""No, I can't help you." He clears h..."
links.text: "No, I can't help you." He clears his throat. "And I'll tell you why..."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""'Cause there's no point, you hear..."
links.text: "'Cause there's no point, you hear me? Unless you believe in ancient fascist magic like some wannabe magus."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Actually, it's called *extraphysics..."
links.text: Actually, it's called *extraphysics* and you don't need to be a magus to access it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't utter a word..."
links.text: The lieutenant doesn't utter a word, but his face says 'I told you so.'

links.title: Endurance: "This fool is a colossal waste of ti..."
links.text: This fool is a colossal waste of time. There's no kingsman inside him -- just self-loathing and entitlement. Let's keep searching.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""'Cause you're a runt and an asshol..."
links.text: "'Cause you're a runt and an asshole."

links.title: Composure: "And he's back to his charming old s..."
links.text: And he's back to his charming old self.

links.title: You: ""You know what? I'll ask someone el..."
links.text: "You know what? I'll ask someone else to help me."

links.title: You: ""Enough! I'll ask someone else how..."
links.text: "Enough! I'll ask someone else how to turn back time."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Uh..." Your sudden change of heart..."
links.text: "Uh..." Your sudden change of heart catches him off guard. "I uh... well... yeah fuck it, it's a stupid question anyway."

links.title: Endurance: "This fool is a colossal waste of ti..."
links.text: This fool is a colossal waste of time. There's no kingsman inside him -- just self-loathing and entitlement. Let's keep searching.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""So you heading off or what?" He cl..."
links.text: "So you heading off or what?" He clears his throat, doing his best to appear indifferent.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Oh, yeah?" He looks intrigued."
links.text: "Oh, yeah?" He looks intrigued.
